summary: FSSC screensaver: Dragonborn Comes Edition has 2 themes, both containing 47 HD screenshots and background music.
descriptionHtml:
Fhelalr's Skyrim Screenshot Collection (FSSC) Screensaver: Dragonborn Comes Edition contains 47 high quality screenshots. All screenshots are in resolution of 1920*1080. It has 2 themes, one is with a black overlay on top of each screenshot, the other is without an overlay.

The main purpose of adding a black overlay was to benefit users with monitor sizes bigger than 1920*1080. A black overlay covers up the border of each screenshot, so it looks like the images blend into the black background if you use it on a monitor larger than 1920*1080.

If your monitor size is exactly 1920*1080, it is better to just use the one without an overlay.

The background music called The Dragonborn Comes is produced by the talented and wonderful Malukah, you can also download it for free from her official website.

Each screenshot's display time and the speed of transition effect has been adapted to the rhyme of the song. The song and all the screenshots will be in a loop.


---------------------------------------------NOTE-------------------------------------------------
"Beauty of Dawn" edition containing 50 screenshots and background music will be uploaded soon.
Also, a special edition containing 100 screenshots without background music will also be released soon.
author: Fhelalr
